thread.title: John, Cobham

author: John, Cobham
title: John, Cobham
text:
Lost a tyre to the ubiquitous pothole - found 'tyresonthedrive' on the web; easy to use website as it told me what my tyres were through the registration. The fitter - Sanam - rang me to let me know he was half an hour away and promptly turned up on time and changed my tyre (after first checking if it could be repaired) very efficiently and cheerfully.
Excellent service at every level
